_a_raid_on_a_sea_fort: A Raid on a Sea Fort
_a_raid_on_a_sea_fort_description: Defeat waves of Phantoms and the Fort Captain to claim its Treasury Key and the plunder inside.
_an_adventure_to_a_sunken_shrine: An Adventure to a Sunken Shrine
_an_adventure_to_a_sunken_shrine_descrip: Explore the Sunken Kingdom as you search for treasure within a Siren Shrine.
_a_raid_on_a_sunken_treasury: A Raid on a Sunken Treasury
_a_raid_on_a_sunken_treasury_description: Enter the Sirens' Sunken Treasury and defeat waves of foes to unlock the plunder waiting within.
_a_duel_with_an_ashen_lord: A Duel with an Ashen Lord
_a_duel_with_an_ashen_lord_description: Defeat an Ashen Lord to claim their treasure and an Ashen Winds Skull!
_a_raid_on_a_skeleton_fort: A Raid on a Skeleton Fort
_a_raid_on_a_skeleton_fort_description: Defeat waves of skeletons and the Skeleton Lord guarding this Fort to claim its Stronghold Key.
_a_battle_with_a_skeleton_fleet: A Battle with a Skeleton Fleet
_a_battle_with_a_skeleton_fleet_descript: Sink a fleet of hostile Skeleton Ships, claiming their supplies and treasure from the waves.
_a_battle_with_the_burning_blades_armada: A Battle with the Burning Blade Armada
Vanquish waves of Ghost Ships and the Burning Blade itself. Keep watch for their plunder and supplies!
_a_pirates_treasure_map: Une carte au trésor de pirate
_a_pirates_treasure_map_description: Étudiez une carte pour découvrir deux coffres au trésor cachés enterrés sur une petite île.

_a_captains_treasure_map_description: Étudiez une carte pour découvrir trois coffres au trésor cachés enterrés sur une grande île.
